definition: the monthly discharge of blood from the uterus of nonpregnant women from puberty to menopause
details:
noun
- the monthly discharge of blood from the uterus of nonpregnant women from puberty to menopause
= example: the monthly discharge of blood from the uterus of nonpregnant women from puberty to menopause
= synonyms: menses, menstruum, catamenia, flow, period
